```{r}
library(caret)
library(randomForest)
library(ranger)
library(rpart)
```

```{r}
cog_data <- readRDS("./data/cog_data_preproc.RDS")
cog_train <- readRDS("./data/cog_train_preproc.RDS")
cog_test <- readRDS("./data/cog_test_preproc.RDS")

set.seed(1)
train_index <- createDataPartition(cog_data$cdr, p = 2/3, list = FALSE, times = 1)

ctrl1 <- trainControl(method = "repeatedcv",
                     repeats = 5,
                     summaryFunction = twoClassSummary, 
                     classProbs = TRUE) 
```

```{r}
#caret
#not exactly sure what mtry and min.node.size should be
rf.grid <- expand.grid(mtry = 1:6,
                       splitrule = "gini",
                       min.node.size = 1:6)

#Error: Setting row names on a tibble is deprecated
set.seed(1)
rf.fit <- train(x = cog_train[3:10],
                y = cog_train$cdr,
                method = "ranger",
                tuneGrid = rf.grid,
                metric = "ROC",
                trControl = ctrl1)

#Error in na.fail.default(list(cdr = c(1L, 1L, 1L, 1L, 1L, 2L, 1L, 2L,  : missing values in object
rf.fit <- train(cdr~., cog_data,
                subset = train_index,
                method = "ranger",
                tuneGrid = rf.grid,
                metric = "ROC",
                trControl = ctrl1)

ggplot(rf.fit, highlight = TRUE)

rf.pred <- predict(rf.fit, newdata = cog_data[-train_index,], type = "prob")[,1]

error_rate_rf <- mean(rf.pred != cog_data$cdr[-train_index])
```
